advisory.name: RLBA-2022:1773
advisory.synopsis: prometheus-jmx-exporter bug fix and enhancement update
advisory.topic: An update for prometheus-jmx-exporter is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisory.description: For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Rocky Linux 8.6 Release Notes linked from the References section.

fixes.description: depends on java-headless metapackage (=JDK8), but works with JDK11 too
